bug.author: karriebear
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
When rerunning through widgets, items that get removed are in some sort of disabled state where things are grayed out. The expander does not have this state. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Go to release demo 0.68 expander demo go to container demo Notice expander is not grayed out while still on page
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
expander grayed out <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24946400/95529876-37c9e280-09aa-11eb-914b-2b9f17d43b7f.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
no
